name: WESLEY DAVISON
text: I took my car to this shop to have the interior gutted so they can clean the seat covers and carpet. I also paid to have the headliner replaced and seat fixed. When I arrived to the car the back seat and plastic interior pieces was broken. The car was still smelling bad. I had to take this car to another shop to get everything fixed and cleaned.

name: Denise Alawine
text: Excellent customer service and outstanding job on my headlights. They look new!  Highly recommend Like Nu. Thanks again, Jamie. Bringing you more work soon.

name: AllDone3
text: Ms. Jamie and Mr. Carter were so nice patient and receptive when I described how I wanted my 88 pickups seat refinished. Used some custom materials and gave them a pretty  good description of what I wanted and they knocked it out of the park ! They even recovered and  foamed my 3 wheeler seat!!! Amazing service!

name: Amanda Baker
text: Jamie and her team do a fantastic job. They replaced the headliner in my 2007 Honda Accord and it looks great. She laid out the costs so there were no hidden fees at the end, and her rates were very competitive. They have a quick turnaround time so that you aren't without your car for too long.  And the shop cat was adorable as well :-)

name: Angela Hurst
text: THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO!Affordable and awesome!! Jamie is so sweet and so helpful.  She taught us how to solve our issue in the future (saving us money on future visits). The moment we stepped out of our vehicle we were greeted and treated like family...lol...it was a pleasant experience.  Thank you for all your help!!

name: henry roberts jr
text: Definitely a friendly place. Mrs.Jamie is very upfront and cares bout the service they provide.

name: donnie edwards
text: OMG!!!! I don’t even know where to start. First I want to thank my coworker for recommending Like Nu. I took my 2008 Cadillac CTS to get a hole repaired in my leather driver seat that was caused by a broken frame. When I went to pick up the car and saw the seat, all I could say is”WOW”.!!!! I can’t even describe the great lengths she went to repair the seat. Not only does the leather look amazing, the frame was fixed and the electric seat works again!!! The prices are very fair and the work is A-1. Jamie and her team are the the greatest at what they do. I would recommend this place to anyone that wants quality work. Thanks again,Jamie.😃😃P.S , very nice family at LIKE NU!!

name: Calvin Turnipseed
text: Took my 2012 Honda Ridgeline in for a new headliner. Jamie was very friendly and professional. My vehicle was ready when promised. It really is “Like Nu” thank y’all for doing quality work and being friendly. I highly recommend this business.

name: Gumbs Messamore
text: You know I like always like the smaller feel of the shops it's more personal but I felt like it was more expensive than it should have been

name: Kyle Ayala
text: I work here

name: Yvonne Kimbrough
text: Had completed work in a timely manner!

name: Jay Day
text: Friendly staff and great pricing. The are currently finishing an upholstery job. I will add more when the repair is complete

name: donnie edwards

I took my 2008 Cadillac CTS to get a hole repaired in my leather driver seat that was caused by a broken frame. When I went to pick up the car and saw the seat, all I could say is”WOW”.!!!! I can’t even describe the great lengths she went to repair the seat. Not only does the leather look amazing, the frame was fixed and the electric seat works again!!! The prices are very fair and the work is A-1. Jamie and her team are the the greatest at what they do. I would recommend this place to anyone that wants quality work. Thanks again,Jamie.😃😃P.S , very nice family at LIKE NU!!

name: abiheags
text: Jamie is so friendly. She helped my mom with her headliner. Price was great and so was the quality of work. Would definitely recommend.

name: Calvin Turnipseed
text: Took my 2012 Honda Ridgeline in for a new headliner. Jamie was very friendly and professional. My vehicle was ready when promised. It really is “Like Nu” thank y’all for doing quality work and being friendly. I highly recommend this business.

name: PAUL HANCERI
text:
Very friendly and professional. Excellent work on my boat upholstery and vehicle too.
Carter and the whole team do great work and have surprised me by completing work ahead of schedule, despite how busy they are.
Thoroughly recommend these guys .

name: Perry Cowart
text: They just completed my boat interior and did a fantastic job. What little we did want addressed they happily did and made sure we were happy. Could not have picked a better place. Highly recommend.

name: Clifford Coleman
text: Like Nu did an AWESOME job on my headliner in my 2005 Buick LeSabre 5 years ago in 2015🙂 I'd recommend them to anyone!!! It still looks great and is holding up well after all these yrs☺

name: Horacio Martinez
text: Overall pretty good service. Had a few details wrong with my truck's interior after they performed their service but was quickly fixed. Friendly staff

name: Sandi Jackson
text: I had my SUV gutted, seats covers cleaned, my carpet cleaned, new headliner, and my rugs dyed to look new on my 2008 Honda Pilot! Great work! Looks new again. Thank you to the staff!

name: Charla Ruby
text: They do Awesome work and are very friendly and polite. I recommend them to anyone😊I am very pleased with my headliner in my truck.

name: J. Morris
text: I recently did business with Like Nu and they rightly deserve 5 stars not only for the quality leather seats they installed in my car, but also for their professionalism. Top of the line service that I'd recommend to anyone!

name: P. T.
text: The people were nice but they do not do vinyl or leather repair on dash or doors.

name: Eric Stanford
text: Very nice experience!! If you have cigarette burns on your roof or car seats this is the place to go. She was very quick and did a great job..

name: Ray Strickland
text: Great job n the new top for my car and the job was done in a timely fashion

name: Jillian Kersten
text: Locally owned business with very friendly owners!  They do excellent work at a very fair price and the work is completed within the time frame they quote you.  I highly recommend and will use them again.

text: They did a quality job on my roof head liner for my 2005 Dodge Grand Caravan. Estimate over the phone was more than when I brought it in for a visual estimate. Because of the good job and them also installing back truck shocks (not apart of the original estimate), I paid the amount originally quoted, although they did not require it. Miss Jamie is the person to ask for...

What he has accomplished for himself has bern done so through hard work, staying en vogue of trends and developing relationships with the clients who source him. Do yourself a favor and become one the next. He and his work are a total experience well worth having.

name: brandi reynolds
text:
My husband and I have an International Scout that was in desperate need of new upholstery for the seats.  Everything from the style and quality of material was met above and beyond. The owner was extremely nice and listened to what we wanted as far as looks went for the “old school” style.  As the quote outside the building says “God Did It” I cant help but think of Isaiah 58:11, Where God Guides, He Provides. If you are wanting true, upstanding quality and honest work; this is the place to go. We will be returning customers.
The only fault we had....he’s an auburn fan. No ones perfect, lol. Roll Tide!

text: Very sloppy work. Cushion came unsewn within a month, button fell off cushion, piping work irregular. Promised to repair problems. They never followed up. No customer service.

name: Anthony Welborn

name: Michael Andress
text: Gave me one price when I dropped off and charged me a hundred plus more when I picked it up....BEWARE

name: Jillian Rosandich
text: I brought in a $40 pea coat for tailoring, but after pinning it up he quoted me $250. That was more than I wanted to spend so I declined. He kept trying to explain why he was charging so much, and said, “Your body type is not normal.” I was quite taken aback. I wear a 12/14, which is not unusual. I think it was probably a language barrier thing, but as someone that works with people’s bodies he should be more aware. He hemmed a pair of silk-like pants for me for $30 and they looked fine. Cash only.

name: Heather R. Houston
text: Phone number is disconnected. 12/2/15

text: We had a headliner replaced and front seats reupholstered. Mr. Harris did an awesome job!  We are so pleased with his work, and would definitely return for additional work on our vehicles.

text: I've been using this cleaning agency for a few months now and am very impressed. We've had stellar service. The housekeepers have been very thorough and efficient. Christiana is our favorite! Highly recommend.

text: Very good automobile detail and paint shop. Had minor paint damage, owners went out of their way to repair the vehicle; it looks almost like new.

name: Angela Calascione
text: Great business run by exceptional people. I hit a deer with my car and they were able to help me replace the hood and front grill at a reasonable price. Saved me $$$$ by not having to go to a collision repair shop. Highly recommend this business for any car or boat repairs. They won't take advantage of you.

name: Fred Holland
text: Aaron went out of his way to make sure I understood the process. He took care of everything from the repairs with insurance (someone hit me) to the rental car. He was busy but always made time for me. I will be bringing my car back for sure.

name: Maurice Quinn
text: It's My fault, I didn't realize the time and that my car wash would take so long. I had an important doctors appointment to make it to. The staff was super kind, pulled my car out of the line-up, and even offered to allow me to come back later. Super impressed!

name: Courtney Brown
text: Very friendly and helpful service as soon as I walked in the door. There was a great selection of fabrics sorted by color. The service once I chose my fabric was very responsive and kind. The prices are a bit more expensive than your craft and hobby shops, but the quality seemed better and it is worth supporting a local shop. I would recommend this shop for your fabric needs and would go back myself.

name: Anna Davis
text: The best variety of upholstery fabrics in town. They are continually getting in new fabrics and decor items so definitely worth visiting at least once every few weeks! Lots of beautiful furniture and home decor items as well as their fabric selection.

name: pebbles stone
text: Great helpful people, love the selection of fabric"

name: Jane Watkins
text: Not helpful, never ask if I needed any. No one else in the establishment. Guess I didn't look like I had enough money to shop there.

name: Samantha Taylor
text: Went into this store today looking for two things: a pillow and to possibly re-do the curtains in my home. I had heard that they do custom curtains and I was excited to see their selection. When I asked one of the employees if they do the custom curtains for you, she just said "yes". When I followed up with saying that I was having a hard time finding some curtains for my home that I liked (AKA I would like to look at some options) her response was "oh really". And then nothing further was offered. My assumption when someone is running a business that specializes in custom curtains and decor is to help an interested customer no matter what. I may look young and may not have been dressed in my Sunday's best, but money was no issue when it came to getting what I wanted. I was fully prepared to replace all of the curtains in my home. I will go elsewhere.

name: Rachelle Griffin
text: Very rude I called ask for some fabric and she said I don’t have that don’t know where to get it real rude I just don’t understand people you expect to make money off of business and then your rude to the people that trying to support your business

resp.text: Rachelle, it’s Suzi from The Chameleon. I’m so sorry if I offended you, it was just my frustration at not being able to find headliner fabric anywhere, and I’ve been searching for it for years. We are here to help, and I hate that I don’t even know where to send someone to get it. Good luck in your search!

name: Cole Kuczerpa
text:
It's great to have a new fabric store in Huntsville. Since Chameleon opened they have continued to expand what they carry. The prices are very reasonable for on the bolt fabric. They also carry additional lines like Magnolia. Hopefully they will succeed in this market and be able to increase hours and products carried.
Kudos for venturing out and providing a much needed service.

name: MirrorImage Salon
text: Great store and a very helpful staff.

name: Melissa Roth
text: I love this place!

name: Matthew “Matt S”
text: Lots of materials here

name: Tony Davila
text: Most selections in Huntsville.

name: Debbie Kinler
text: We've had several projects completed here and have always been very satisfied. Some were as complicated as bimini/solar panel integrations and others just simple restitching. All were completed when promised and work was professional. As we have discovered over the years in different places, that's not always the case. At Canvas Works they listen to you, discuss the options and deliver the product as promised. Very happy to have them!

name: Eric Reuss
text: I had the Canvas Works make a cushion for my boat, having provided it an exact duplicate of the item I wanted. The cushion was made and delivered to me. Instead of using the normal inside cushion material, Canvas Works put in a slab of cheap foam rubber, which provided no cushioning at all. When I brought back the product to be corrected, the business owner told me she put in to the cushion the foam rubber I had given her, which was a patent lie; I provided no materials to her, only giving her the direction that I wanted a duplicate of the the existing cushion, which I provided her to duplicate. She refused to make the correction, told me to come pick up the cushion, then hung up on me. I went to pick up the cushion, from which the cheap foam rubber had been ripped out.

name: Lex Rosenbaum
text: King helped us a lot. Very good care of my boat canvas. Came out beautiful

name: melisa yeend
text: Very fine work and great people working there.

name: Carla Holder
text: Work is very good. Takes longer than expected.

name: Bryan Patterson
text: Awesome

text: Great service and awesome work.  Before on left and after on right. Amazing transformation of an 18 year old interior.

text: Jose  did an outstanding job with wrapping my center console in leather. Thank you!

name: Brian Lanier
text: Great prices and service.

name: Matt Mitcham
text: Absolutely the best place in this area for really quality upholstery.  Sherri is the best!!!

name: Sandra Frost
text: I had a chair done there over 25 years ago. Did great work, still have and use the chair. But, the place reeks of cigarette smoke. Took a chair a couple of weeks ago and did not leave it. Just can't take that smell. Such a shame because they do a great job...

name: Samantha W.
text: Excellent work

name: Steve Porter
text: They are AWESOME

name: Kathy Hamm
text: I did not have an experience with this company because they never replied to me.  I called them and message said to send a text which I did.  I have not heard from them and it has been three weeks.  I guess they don't need my business.

name: S Eiland
text: Does good work

name: Dan
text: I had a car with damage to the front seat and attempted to get an estimate.  Called several times a week for about two weeks with no answer.  The wife finally decided to drive down to the shop to see if we could get find some info in person.  She ended up waiting around for quite a while before someone finally got to her, and the staff seemed rather annoyed that they had to take time out to talk to a customer.  They finally sent someone to look at the car, took some pictures, and told her they would get back to us in a couple days with an estimate.  He was pleasant and professional. That was 24 May. A couple weeks went by and nothing... tried calling multiple times and got no answer.  When someone finally answered, she was extremely unprofessional and quite rude.  We told her our situation, and asked the status of our estimate; she said the one who helped us was new, and that there was no way they were going to get back to us that fast, said it was going to be a while, but couldn't give us any sort of expected response time.  She was snappy, extremely rude, and pretty unprofessional.  19 June and still no response... pretty sure we're headed to Norm's out in Gurley.

resp.text: Hi. Totally apologize. I’m a one man team and I’m overloaded with emails and work. Please send me pictures I will send a quote. 2564680377

name: Tariq
text: These people asked me to send pictures of the job that I needed done, and never called me back with quote. They made me waste my time. I didn't appreciate it. Especially since I asked a lot of questions, and their answers were different than their actions. Good luck with these people!

resp.text: Hi. Totally apologize. I’m a one man team and I’m overloaded with emails and work. Please send me pictures I will send a quote. 2564680377

name: Chris Fisher
text: They never would call me back for a estimate, I'm not going to beg these people to do business with me.

resp.text: Hi. Totally apologize. I’m a one man team and I’m overloaded with emails and work. Please send me pictures I will send a quote. 2564680377

name: John Bryson
text: They were so unprofessional about communicatng on the job I asked them if they could do.  If you asked to speak to manager he is aways out or in abouy to go out.  Very poor service, they wasted so many days with my bed cover to tell me they could not fix, it made me miss an appointment with another place that wanted to try and fix it

resp.text:
Mr. Bryson,
I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. I assure you we have tried our best day in and day out to find another company who could trim down your bed cover since we weren’t able to however we were unable to locate anyone within a 100 mile radius who could get the job done. I’m sorry it had to come to this but hopefully if you cannot get a refund you can find someone with that particular expertise. Thank you for the opportunity and again I do apologize and hopefully one day in the future we can earn back your business.

name: andros thomson
text:
Restored to original condition torn drivers seat in Jeep Altitude! Owner is hands on and he and his team are user friendly! Have already recommended them to my neighbor ! Could not be happier with all aspects of Moore’s Upholstery! Highest recommendation!
Thanks for the great work!

name: Denise Smith
text: Kenneth and his team has a great customer service attitude and they did an outstanding job on a headliner replacement. Not to forget that our truck was ready at the time we were promised. We will definitely repeat our business in the future!

name: Randal Knight
text: Quality and value can't be matched in the area. I took my 2010 Ford F-150 in to get a driver's seat re-upholstered. I wish I would have taken before and after pictures. Looks brand new. Kenneth does great work. Also, Doug in the body department did some touch up paint and body work for me. Again, great work, great price. Will definitely go back for any future needs and highly recommend.

name: 3932L
text: I dropped off my 2001 F250 for the front seat to be reupholstered.  Moore's did a fantastic job and went above and beyond by also re-cushioning the front seat.  And, he was much more affordable than the other places I called.  I will definitely recommend him to others and will be back.

resp.text: Thanks so much! Make sure to visit our new location 2490 Washington St HSV.

text: Excellent upholstery work, would recommend to anyone needing interior work to their vehicle

resp.text: Thanks so much! Make sure to visit our new location 2490 Washington St HSV.

name: Off the Wallz Odd Ballz Melissa Rezabek
text: Bruce is an awesome guy . He does great work one some fabulous cars

name: Nevaeh Rose
text: Don't go here if you want your car fixed on this year because my 2004 pontiac has been in their shop for over two in a half months! This is utterly ridiculous, if you can't work on it within that time frame why not at least let you know. I was never contacted on this matter either I would have to call and wait several minutes for someone to pick up the phone. Either way would not recommend, if I could I would give a zero star rating.

name: Russell Whisnant
text: Attached are pictures of what $2000 will get you at Byron's Scam shop. After paying money up front I got this horrendous paint job and "leather" (That's what I paid for) that is actually vinyl. I currently have an outstanding judgement against Byron and his place of business for $2000 which he refuses to pay. Needless to say, you should avoid this place of business like the plague.

name: Derrick Hampton
text: Very professional work.

name: Trey Huncho
text: People work there so courteous and understanding

name: Tiffany Howington
text: Byron's Paint and Body has repaired my vehicles for the past four years. They have always done a great job. The first vehicle they repaired was my 2011 Ford Escape. I backed into a tree - broke the tail light and did damage to the rear side of the vehicle. They fixed the vehicle quickly. I only had the rental vehicle (which was paid by my insurance) for two days. The work was excellent. You could not tell where I had ever hit anything. The most recent repair was to the windshield of my 2015 Mitsubishi Outlander. A rock hit and shattered the glass. Byron's scheduled the windshield replacement on my lunch break and had the car ready for me to pick up within the hour. Great service. I highly recommend.

name: Adrian Smith
text: Byron and his guys believe in excellence! They want to make sure that each customer is satisfied and confident in choosing him as their Upholstery, Paint and Body expert!

name: Brittani Moton
text: Excellent fast and friendly service!!! Staff does an amazing job!

name: Jesus Christ
text: Run very non professional. We used Luverne upholstery...

name: Ricky Buchanan
text: When Eddie was alive I gave his business a 5 star rating, he was great. His son now runs the business and is talented he is just not nearly as easy to get in touch with as his father was. If you can get him and nail down an appointment time you will be happy with the work but you have to be patient.

name: Jerry Mays
text: Did a quick and professional job on my wifes car.

name: Joan Beltz
text: Did  a good  job on my car. Friendly people. Told  me just  what it would cost

name: Rebekah Nordine
text: I came here to get my headliner replaced, and Eddie was quick and thorough. He also said to call if I had any issues with the headliner from here on out because he'd fix it for free. I'd definitely recommend Eddie and his shop for anyone needing some kind of covering fixed in their car!

name: Ladd MacDavid
text: Long time upholstery shop. Excellent workmanship and pleasant, honest owner.

name: Brenda Stanley
text: Great work. Wonderful employees

name: Kina Ruggs
text: Eddie recovered the seats in my car. He did an excellent job.

name: Tracy Dawkins
text: Did a good job.

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Tatiana at Calico Corners in Hoover is lovely! She is so knowledgeable and has helped me make my house just the way I wanted it. She is clear, concise, works within my budget, and an all-around fantastic decorator and person!

resp.text:
Hello Cameron,

Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey and for the 5 star rating! We are happy to hear that you had a great experience at our store with Tatiana, we will definitely let her know.. We look forward to working with you again very soon. Thank you - Vik

name: Julie King
text: Excellent service! Tatyana is like having your own designer- so talented and willing to help. The store is clean and organized, and again the customer service is fantastic. I won't be going to any other fabric stores- they have it all!

name: Merrilyn Cook
text: Great selection of fabrics and great service. Be sure to see Jeannie. She is wonderful!

name: Mary Jane Karwoski
text: Great service

name: Tariq
text: They are backed up 4 months right now, but the customer service was pretty good. They were informative and courteous, although they couldn't help me. I'd still use their service.

name: Laurie Thompson
text: For about 16 years, I’ve worked with Roger Keel in repairing and upholstering antique pieces.  His company is the best I’ve ever experienced ie had some cane back breakfast room chairs that he outsourced and they are beautiful. Further, he is nice, easy to work with and with honest and fair business practices. Highly recommend this company!!

name: Stephen Hunt
text: Excellent furniture refinishing and upholstery at Keel.  I have had work done here for more than 20 years and I wouldn't think of going anywhere else!

name: Chris Mahan
text: It is a very professional business.

name: Marty McArthur
text: After a 2 year search found a TV cabinet at Birmingham Wholesale. Unusual size was perfect, finally. But dark finish, I needed blonde.  Roger Keel is across the street.  He antiqued it and it looks like it came form the showroom floor that way.  Excellent work, completed in specified time

name: Danny Boone
text: I inherited my grandfather's antique leather sofa, something he loved and I remember sitting on as a kid. It had been stored in really bad conditions and in an awful state. Took it to Keel's Upholstery to see if it could be resurrected and those guys did an excellent job! Grandad would be so proud.

name: Katie Mitchell Bell
text: Great service; great work. Highly recommend them!

name: Lorenza Davis
text: I had a wonderful experience with Keel Refinishing and Upholstery.  I found Mr. Keel to be very knowledgeable about upholstery and furniture refinishing.  He has many years of experience and is very eager to satisfy his customers to the fullest extent.  For any one who is in the Birmingham area, including Southside, UAB, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Vestavia Hills, Hoover, Pelham, Bessemer, Midfield, Fairfield and McCalla, please know that this is a great place to get quality craftsmanship and superior customer service.  The quality of the materials used by Keel is excellent and you can tell that the upholsterer is fully dedicated to his craft.  If you are looking for furniture reupholsters and furniture refinishing  Keel is the place to go.

name: Betty Bowen
text: rude very rude if i had  choice it would be o stars

name: Kathy I
text: The five stars, for Front Porch Shop....Is due to the store's beauty. The front of the store, is very attractive. This definitely is, a place to see.

name: Jeannette Cadorette
text: Came here to visit and the owner is so sweet and enjoyable. Very nice layout of the whole house.

name: Connie Bonin
text: I LOVE this shop! The shop owner was so gracious and helped us so much today. I will definitely be going back. 💕💕

name: Tammy Bush
text: Awesome place, porch , fabric galore but what makes this place the best is the awesomely wonderful staff and owners they are the best in the 🌎...So stop in and sit a spell on The Front Porch☺👍

name: Paula Johnson
text: Beautiful building, fabrics galore! One young lady talked with me and answered all my questions. Older lady walked by me 5 times and even though I was only customer in store she didn't say boo!

name: Keith Laverty
text: We stopped today and visited with Melissa!  The friendliest quilt shop we visited on our 2800 mile summer road trip! Great selection of fabric and amazing samples and ideas. (Check out their website for their generous offer of free patterns.) Melissa was extremely knowledgeable, gracious, cordial and charming. It’s what quilters want when visiting a quilt shoppe. Continued success! And we look forward to visiting again. Many many thanks for making our visit so special!

name: Barbara Boggess
text: Great store beautiful fabrics wonderful service

name: Nannett McDougal-Dykes
text: It was amazing...found just what I needed...thanks for your help everyone..

name: Annette Mixon
text: Loads of fabric!!  Young girl working the day we stopped by was knowledgeable and willing to answer tons of questions.  She was quilting that day and let us watch the machine.  If you need fabric or lessons - this is the place!

name: Savannah Simpson
text: The Quilt shop has a wide variety of fabric, patterns and sewing notions. While chain stores may offer some fabric for a cheaper price, the Quilt shop carries nice quality fabric. Also the shop has a charming atmosphere with lovely ladies working there. Highly recommend to stop and look around.

name: Nichole Taylor
text: I did not go in but my husband went in to look for some Christmas gifts for his Mom. He said that the lady working today was very helpful and pointed out some great ideas. The building this shop is in is so cute!

resp.text:
It’s awesome for a son to put so much thought and care into a gift for his mom!
She is going to love everything he chose for her.💗🎄✂️

name: Lois Rose
text: Nice, friendly shop. Converted house with each room a different sewing theme.

name: Karl D
text: Wonderful selection, delightful owner. Highly recommend.

name: Nancy Sockwell
text: I love this Shoppe! There are so many fabrics with all kinds of great samples to give you ideas.  ...Lots and lots of ideas!!

name: Tanya Rabren
text: Always polite and helpful.

name: Barbara Spencer
text: If you are a quilter, this is a great place to visit. So many quilting patterns and beautiful material.

name: Penny Miklovic
text: Love the shop. Lots of cheerfulness in color and staff.

name: Denise Ellis
text: This is such a fun and interesting place to visit - I could spend hours in the shop!

name: Kathryn Swanson
text:
Friendly and we'll stocked shop.
Staff: book we discussed for Sea Glass Quilt is "Quilts Made Modern" by Weeks Ringle and Bill Kerr

name: Kimberly Sperling
text: Wide selection of quality fabric notions and patterns!

name: Racquel Hamm
text: What a fun place to visit! Shop was so charming and friendly staff!!!!

name: Susan Denney
text: The most amazing fabrics, patterns, and quilts!

name: lisa hudson
text: Great quilt shop

name: Steven Nimocks
text: Has everything you need and more.

name: JD InDaleville
text: Beautiful materials.

name: Cora Welbes
text: Great selection of fabrics!

name: Carla Hayes
text: Love it!!

name: Barbara Ostrander
text: Friendly staff, wide variety of fabrics and projects on display.  This place is a little gem!

name: Sandra Roth
text: Love this shop!

name: Pamala O'Steen
text: Everyone there is always so fun and very helpful..its always a blast to go hang and get ideas and help with a project.

name: Dwan Kirby
text:
Friendly
Fair price
Quality work
Years of experience

name: Sheila Wilkerson
text: Outstanding workmanship.  Friendly helpful people.

name: luke haddix
text: If you need upholstery work done these people know their stuff! They are friendly and honest and do the job right at a fare price. With quality craftsmanship that can't be matched. Thanks

name: Brian Williams
text: great workmanship
